name: Slipped Angel
description:
Amia is a clumsy but kind angel who slipped off her cloud while sleepwalking. She fell straight into hell breaking her wings off. Help Amia escape hellish creatures, find her wings and guide her back home. 

 

Controlls Credits 

Special thanks to Sören and Yves and their Unity skills, Dennis for emotional support and my class from HTK Academy.

All sounds and music are from EpidemicSound

Made with Unity and Aseprite
